Sentencas: The system Zn1-xMnxFe2O4 (x = 0, 2, and 4%) was prepared by sol-gel chemical route at 80 degrees C. X-Ray powder diffraction and Raman spectrum analysis were used to determine the preliminary phase of obtained samples.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: W-H and SSP plots were used to determine the crystallite size and micro-strain of samples.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The surface charge and morphology of the samples were studied using zeta potential and scanning electron microscope analysis, respectively.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The optical bandgap of the samples suggested that they were semiconducting.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The dielectric characteristics of samples were examined as a function of temperature (60-600 degrees C) at various frequencies (1 kHz, 10 kHz, 100 kHz, and 1 MHz).
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The presence of interfacial and orientational polarization was indicated by dielectric constant and dissipation factor studies, which ranged from (0.7-460) to (0.3-0.8) with Mn and were found thermally stable up to 300 degrees
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method
Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The thermal dependence of DC conductivity demonstrates Arrhenius type transport with one, two, and three regions of conduction in sample ZF-0, ZF-2, and ZF-4 respectively.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The sources of charge carriers in samples were V-o(center dot center dot), e ' (V-o(center dot center dot) - 2Fe(Fe3+)(2+)')/(2Mn(Zn2+)(3+center dot) -2Fe(Fe3+)(2+)').
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method

Sentencas: The current work could help to identify the possible applications in semiconductor devices, thermally stable capacitors, and as mixed ionic electronic conductors in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural, optical and electrical properties of Mn-doped ZnFe2O4 synthesized using sol-gel method
